title: Hypnotic somnambulism and Quantum hypnosis / Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
In this video, students form Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, practice and experience the most unique techniques. Dr. Paret hypnotized one of the students, using Fascination - the power of the gaze, Quantum hypnosis and Magnetic passes. She entered in deep trance state of hypnotic somnambulism. Her hands took a mudra position. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
